21-1185.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the State Legislation Committee meeting held Wednesday, August 25, 2021.A motion was made by Vice Chair Austin, seconded by Chair Uranga, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Page 1 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 3:00 PMTHURSDAY, FEBRUARY 17, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHSTATE LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTESYes: 2 - Uranga and AustinAbsent: 1 - Richardson2.

21-1187.summary: Recommendation to receive and file staff recommendations for the City’s 2022 State Legislative Agenda, gather input from the State Legislation Committee, and forward the Committee’s recommendations to the City Council for adoption.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke; and provided the staff report.Vice Chair Austin spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Austin and Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs.Chair Uranga spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.Vice Chair Austin spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Austin and Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs.Chair Uranga spoke.Vice Chair Austin spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Austin and Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs.Chair Uranga spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.Page 2 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 3:00 PMTHURSDAY, FEBRUARY 17, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHSTATE LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTESA dialogue ensued between Chair Uranga and Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs.Dave Shukla spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Austin, seconded by Chair Uranga, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Uranga and AustinAbsent: 1 - Richardson3.
